sections.general: lead ux/ui designer executive profile insightful, ux/ui designer with experience in both agile and waterfall environments. adept at distilling abstract concepts into solid, elegant, defined web and mobile applications. seeking position with the chance to develop a company's creative direction. review of my work can be found on http://www.krop.com/mikal-ali/ skill highlights adobe creative suite axure target process sketch html/css fireworks leadership/communication skills illustrator product development small business development self-motivated project management user-centered design interactive prototypes design, layout and typography heuristic evaluation wire-framing style-guide creation
